title: Show 247- *Andy Burnham Live*
itunes:title: Show 247- *Andy Burnham Live*
itunes:subtitle: The Mayor of Manchester is on sparkling form as he sets out his vision for where Labour needs to be. It's a great mix of thoughtful political analysis and riveting behind-the-scenes detail as Andy tells the incredible inside story behind ...
description:
The Mayor of Manchester is on sparkling form as he sets out his vision for where Labour needs to be. It's a great mix of thoughtful political analysis and riveting behind-the-scenes detail as Andy tells the incredible inside story behind his showdowns with the UK and Scottish governments. He also tells the heartbreaking story of the Hlllsborough families' long campaign for justice and his role in changing the Labour government's position, including the moment he stands in front of a packed Anfield at the memorial service. Recorded during the Labour Conference, Andy reacts to the big stories of the week as well as revealing his plans for when the Conservatives hold their Conference in Manchester. 

 

Follow Andy on Twitter: @AndyBurnhamGM

 

Watch the moment Andy addresses Anfield at the Hillsborough memorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-z3mBIi084Q

 

NEW GUESTS ANNOUNCED FOR THE POLITICAL PARTY LIVE:

 

11 Oct: Penny Mordaunt

25 Oct: Caroline Flint

8 Nov: Anas Sarwar

22 Nov: Anthony Scaramucci

6 Dec: Jeremy Hunt

 

Buy tickets to The Political Party, live at The Duchess Theatre including the next night with Penny Mordaunt on Monday 11 October here: https://www.nimaxtheatres.com/shows/the-political-party-with-matt-forde/

 

Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com

 

Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
